author: joerg
msg: patch 19104 applied: Fixed SchematronValidator.evalRule() in xmlforms block: create a relative context instead of an absolute one.
This allows to refer to another form field by using relative paths (../password) instead of choosing a common root.

author: joerg
msg: evalRule() now creates a relative context instead of an absolute one
this allows to refer to another form field by using relative paths (../password) instead of choosing a common root
